text: ما تسبق من امة اجلها وما يستـخرون

translations.translation: No nation can advance its appointed time nor can they delay it.
No nation can live beyond its allotted time, or lag behind.
No nation can outstrip its term, nor can it put it back.
Every nation has an appointed life span.
No nation can go before its term ends nor stay back.
No nation can advance their term, nor can they delay it.
No people can hasten on their doom nor can they postpone (it).
no nation outstrips its term, nor do they put it back.
No nation can outstrip its term, nor yet postpone it.
no community can advance or postpone its appointed time,
No community can anticipate their term, nor can they lay behind.
No nation can advance its time nor can it defer it.
No people can hasten their term, nor can they delay (it).
No nation can anticipate their term, nor can they delay it.
no nation outstrips its term, nor do they put it back.
No nation can advance its time, nor can they postpone it.
No nation will precede its time [of termination], nor will they remain [thereafter].

[23:43] No community can precede its term, by dying before it, nor be deferred, beyond it (the person [in the second verb yasta’khirūna, ‘be deferred’] is masculine, having been feminine [in the first verb tasbiqu, ‘precede’] because this [masculine plural] takes into account the [plural masculine] content [of the term ‘community’]).
(No nation can outstrip its term) no nation can bring forward the term appointed for its destruction, (nor yet postpone it) to a later date.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة أهلكناهم؛ بحيث { مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا } أي: ما تستعجل وتستقدم أمةُ منهم أجلَها الذي عيَّنَّا لإهلاكها، وقدرنا هلاكهم فيه { وَمَا يَسْتَأْخِرُونَ } [المؤمنون: 43] أيضاً: لا يسمع لهم الاستقدام والاستئخار في المدة المقدرة المعينة لهلاكهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: يقول الحق جل جلاله: { ثم أنشأنا من بعدهم } أي: من بعد قوم هود، { قروناً آخرين } قوم صالح ولوط وشعيب وغيرهم، { ما تسبق من أمة } ، " مِنْ " صلة، أي: ما تتقدم أمة من الأمم المهلكة { أجلَها } الذي عُيِّن لهلاكها في الأزل، { وما يستأخرون } عنه ساعة
